name: Kimchi Garden
description: A popular spot for Korean cuisine, famous for its kimchi fried rice and a variety of traditional stews and grills, frequented by those looking for authentic flavors and a loyalty rewards program.

name: Berkeley Dumpling Kitchen
description: A vibrant eatery renowned for its diverse range of dumplings and other Chinese delights. It's a favorite among locals who value the reward points system.

name: IB's
description: A local favorite offering a selection of classic American fast food. It's well-known for its burgers and fries and features a customer reward system.

name: D'Yar
description: An establishment that provides a taste of Middle Eastern cuisine, specializing in dishes like falafel wraps and is loved for its customer loyalty rewards.

name: Blondie's Pizza
description: This pizzeria is famed for its generous slices and various pizza options, attracting those who enjoy American-style pizza and appreciate a rewards program.

name: T-toust
description: A culinary spot celebrated for its Korean dishes, particularly its soups and bibimbap. It is popular with diners who enjoy authentic Korean flavors and a loyalty program.

name: Super Duper Burgers
description: A bustling burger joint known for its artisanal burgers and a wide variety of toppings, appealing to those who enjoy classic American comfort food.

name: KoJa Kitchen
description: A fusion eatery blending Korean flavors with Japanese techniques, offering unique dishes like the Kamikaze Fries and a variety of rice bowls.

name: Muracci's Berkeley
description: A Japanese establishment specializing in curry and other traditional dishes, known for its hearty flavors and generous portions.

name: Poke Parlor
description: A trendy spot for poke bowls, featuring fresh, sustainably-sourced ingredients and offering a customizable bowl experience.
